name: Surprise Wreath
introduction: The Xmas Angel ask about what the surprise is? The Xmas Angel stared at the wreath in her hand and thought, she seemed to be excited when she discovered a new world of flowers and plants. She is still thinking, looking for an answer forever.

skills.name: Frozen Snow (Frozen field)
skills.description: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 40%

skills.name: Arrow of Surprise (Surprise Arrow)
skills.description: Deals P.DMG to one more enemy

skills.name: Twilight
skills.description: ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)
